title: quarkus:update not working on Windows when project is without mvnw

labels.name: triage/qe?
labels.description: Issue could use a quality focused review to further harden it

body: ### Describe the bug `quarkus:update` not working on Windows when project is without mvnw We this thanks to https://github.com/quarkus-qe/quarkus-startstop testsuite Log output from GH actions based run: ``` [INFO] Executing: C:\ProgramData\chocolatey\lib\maven\apache-maven-3.8.7\bin\mvn.cmd -e org.openrewrite.maven:rewrite-maven-plugin:4.43.0:run -D"plainTextMasks=**/src/main/codestarts/**/*.java,**/*.txt,**/META-INF/services/**,**/*.adoc,**/src/test/resources/__snapshots__/**/*.java,**/*.kt,**/*.md" -D"rewrite.configLocation=C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\quarkus-project-recipe-17955793016890682862.yaml" -D"activeRecipes=io.quarkus.openrewrite.Quarkus" -D"rewrite.pomCacheEnabled=false" [INFO] [ERROR] =**/src/main/codestarts/**/*.java was unexpected at this time. ``` I'm able to reproduce this on sample app from code.quarkus (just with mvnw related bits removed and changed Quarkus version to 3.0.2.Final) ### Expected behavior Update works without fail ### Actual behavior Update procedure fails ### How to Reproduce? - Get sample app from https://code.quarkus.io/ - Remove mvnw related bits from the project - Changed Quarkus version to 3.0.2.Final so the full update procedure is triggered - run `mvn quarkus:update` `[ERROR] =**/src/test/resources/__snapshots__/**/*. java was unexpected at this time.` can be seen in the log ### Output of `uname -a` or `ver` Windows 10 ### Output of `java -version` Java 11 ### GraalVM version (if different from Java) _No response_ ### Quarkus version or git rev Quarkus 3.0.2.Final ### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`) _No response_ ### Additional information _No response_
